parameters.description: URL expiration time in seconds (default: 3600, max: 86400)

List all runs for a pipeline

get.summary: List all user attributes for an organization.
get.description:
Returns all users and their attributes for the specified organization.
This is useful for administrative views showing all user access configurations.
Only organization viewers and above can access this endpoint.

200.description: All user attributes in the organization
List all users in an organization

201.description: User added to the organization successfully

409.description: User already exists in the organization

204.description: User removed from the organization successfully

get.summary: List all attributes for a user in an organization.
get.description:
Returns all RLS attributes assigned to the user in the specified organization.
Attributes are in `namespace::value` format (e.g., `region::occitanie`).

put.summary: Set all attributes for a user (replaces existing).
put.description:
Replaces all existing attributes for the user with the provided list.
All attributes must be in valid `namespace::value` format.
Only organization owners can perform this operation.

post.summary: Add a single attribute to a user.
post.description:
Adds a new attribute to the user's existing attributes.
The attribute must be in valid `namespace::value` format.
If the attribute already exists, this is a no-op.
Only organization owners can perform this operation.

delete.summary: Remove a single attribute from a user.
delete.description:
Removes the specified attribute from the user.
The attribute path parameter must be URL-encoded (e.g., `region%3A%3Aoccitanie`).
Only organization owners can perform this operation.

get.summary: List context providers for an organization.
List contextual restrictions for an organization.

403.description: User not authorized to refresh data docks in this organization

get.summary: Get effective security settings (org + datadock combined).

post.summary: Creates a pipeline CRD, meant to be called from console
Creates a pipeline CRD using the new V2 API with discriminated union

Configuration for a FileRouter destination

FileSorter output configuration - combines 3 steps:
HephaistosPdfeed -> Labelize -> CategoryRouterMetadataAware

dd_trino_int.description: UUID of the Trino Data Dock for metadata storage

destination_s3_dd.description: UUID of the destination S3 Data Dock for sorted files

labels_yaml.description:
Labels for document classification in YAML format.
Supports both static and dynamic labels with placeholders.

Example:
```yaml
- id: facture_eau
  type: static
  description: "Water utility invoices"
- id: travaux
  type: dynamic
  description: "Construction work documents"
  format: "TRAVAUX/{year}/{date}"
  placeholders:
    - id: year
      source: "Extract the year"
      format: "YYYY"
```

model_api_key.description: Mistral API key for OCR and classification

source_file_connection_id.description: Source S3 connection ID for router (references input.dd_minio)

unknown_placeholder_value.description: Value to use when a placeholder cannot be extracted (default: "unknown")

default_category.description: Default category if no label matches

source_prefix_regex.description: Regex to extract prefix from source path (single capture group)

FileSorterSourceConfig.description: FileSorter source configuration (S3 bucket for unsorted files)

data_container_id.description: Data Container ID for the source bucket (DataDock is resolved automatically)

folder_prefix.description: Optional folder prefix within the bucket

console_base_domain.description: The base domain for the console (e.g., "localhost" for dev, "hyperfluid.app" for prod).

Harbor.description:
A harbor is a collection of [DataDocks](super::datadock::Datadock)
Each harbor belongs to an [Org](super::org::Org)
Each harbor has an owner who is a [User](super::user::User)

LabelDefinition.description:
Label definition for document classification (Labelize step)
Supports both static labels (id + description) and dynamic labels with placeholders.

Example YAML format:
```yaml
- id: facture_eau
  type: static
  description: "Water utility invoices"
- id: travaux
  type: dynamic
  description: "Construction work documents"
  format: "TRAVAUX/{year}/{date}-{work_name}"
  placeholders:
    - id: year
      source: "Extract the year from the document"
      format: "YYYY"
      rules: ["Must be 4 digits"]
```

ListContextualRestrictionsResponse.description: Response for list of contextual restrictions.

ListUserAttributesResponse.description: Response containing a list of user attributes.

FileRouter routing rules: label -> list of destinations
Example: {"type::invoice": [DestinationConfig { data_dock_id: "uuid", bucket_id: "uuid", prefix: "invoices/" }]}

PipelineMetadata.description: Pipeline metadata configuration (common to all pipeline types)

enabled.description: Whether the pipeline is enabled (only applies to CronJobs)

one_off.description: Whether this is a one-off job (true) or a scheduled CronJob (false)

oneOf.description: Copy: Import from external API to S3 destination

enabled.description:
Whether the pipeline is enabled. Only applies to CronJob pipelines.
When false, the CronJob will be suspended. Defaults to true (enabled).

instances.description: Number of PostgreSQL instances (1=standalone, 2+=HA with replicas)
